QuestData.Title: The Shadow Vault
QuestData.Description: It sounds like you did extremely well. And you secured three very important allies for the Knights of the Ebon Blade in the process.$B$B<Thassarian gazes out over the horizon.>$B$BYou should head back. By now, Baron Sliver and the other death knights will be fighting tooth and nail to hold The Shadow Vault against the might of the Scourge.$B$BI'm sure they'll need your help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report back to Baron Sliver at The Shadow Vault.
QuestData.RewardText: Good of you to return. As you can see, we have our hands full here.
